item.title: OCIO - Python
item.description: I am writing a tool for Houdini that can create, save and apply color themes to color ramp parameters. In this project I needed to convert sRGB to “linear”. There are many algorithms to do this but this lead me to strat taking a look at OCIO. I have barely dipped my toes in it but here are som notes to get it up and running in Python. First I activate the venv into which I want to install OCIO Then I run pip install opencolorio With the package installed make sure that your IDE can access the package We also need to download a OCIO configuration file from here import os import PyOpenColorIO as OCIO def apply_rgb(rgb, src_space, dst_space): try: config = OCIO.
